From: Rick <ticket@smtp2go.com>
Sent: Wednesday, 27 August 2025 3:34 PM

Subject: [Request received] SMTP2GO - call follow up

You don't often get email from ticket@smtp2go.com. Learn why this is important


Your request (#341463) has been received and is being reviewed by our support staff.

To add additional comments you may reply to this email, or visit: http://support.smtp2go.com/
(You may have to "Login" from the upper right, which will first take you to the login page.)

Rick (SMTP2GO Support)

27 Aug 2025, 05:34 UTC

Hi there,

The SPF for aussieindustries.com.au is currently:
 v=spf1 include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:sent-via.netsuite.com -all

Update that to:
 v=spf1 include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:sent-via.netsuite.com include:spf.smtp2go.com -all

Please let us know if you have any further questions we can help with or if you need assistance with your account.

Take care and enjoy your day.

Kind regards,
Rick
SMTP2GO

This email is a service from SMTP2GO Support. Delivered by Zendesk
